title: Hello, Mrs. Piggle-Wiggle
description: "The incomparable Mrs. Piggle-Wiggle loves children good or bad and never scolds but has positive cures for Answer-Nackers, Never-Want-to-Go-to-Bedders, and other boys and girls with strange habits. '[Now] in paperback . . . for a new generation of children to enjoy.'" - San Francisco Examiner Chronicle.
author: Betty MacDonald
